column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " We made it for you .
#Text=A good night 's sleep will probably take the crazy away .
#Text=You guys keep telling me that I need to sleep , but I ca n't !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang ... " Aang says : " No , Katara !
#Text=There 's still so much I have n't learned .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm not going to hit you .
#Text=" Toph says : " You want me to do it ?
#Text=You 've been training for this since the day we met .
#Text=" Aang says : " You really think so ?
#Text=" Toph says : " You 're the man , Twinkle Toes !
#Text=Your days of tyranny are over , Fire Lord !
#Text=" Aang says : " No , Fire Lord Ozai .
